hook.text: Buffer publishes every employee's salary online. It terrified them. Then it built loyalty.

buildup.text: Transparency feels risky because it exposes flaws. Hiding flaws is riskier.

discovery.text: In the age of reviews and leaks, customers will find the truth regardless.

twist.text: Brands that disclose first control the narrative. Those who hide lose control entirely.

climax.text: Everlane shares factory costs on every product. Customers pay more because they trust it.

quiz.question: Why is proactive transparency a smart marketing strategy?
options: Brands that disclose first control the narrative
Transparency eliminates the need for advertising
Only nonprofit organizations benefit from openness
